findings.description: All button variants pass WCAG AA contrast requirements with white text on colored backgrounds
findings.recommendation: No action needed. Consider AAA targets (7:1) for critical actions.

findings.description: All button variants meet APCA minimum Lc 60 for body text. APCA provides perceptually uniform contrast measurement for WCAG 3.0.

evidence.actual: Primary Lc -76.72, Secondary Lc -77.53, Danger Lc -80.07

findings.recommendation: No action needed. APCA values are negative (light text on dark background). All variants exceed the Lc 60 threshold for body text.

findings.description: No button variant meets WCAG AAA enhanced contrast (7:1). Users in bright environments or with low vision may have difficulty.
findings.recommendation: Consider providing a high-contrast theme or increasing background darkness for AAA compliance.

findings.description: Default button height is 36px, below the WCAG AAA recommendation of 44x44 CSS pixels
findings.recommendation: Passes WCAG AA (2.5.8, 24px minimum). For AAA, increase to 44px or provide a comfortable density variant for touch contexts.

findings.description: Spacing between button variants is 40px, well above minimum requirements
Focus indicator not verifiable from static Figma designs. Requires runtime verification in Storybook.

findings.recommendation: Verify focus indicator in Storybook with keyboard navigation. Ensure focus ring meets 2px minimum width and 3:1 contrast against adjacent colors.
